title: UAE Minister speaks with DPM Dar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 6 (APP): Minister of State for Foreign Affairs, United Arab Emirates (UAE) Ahmed bin Ali Al Sayegh on Friday spoke with Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar who is currently visiting the United Kingdom.
During a telephonic conversation, they discussed Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) related issues and key areas of bilateral cooperation in the field of trade and investment, a press release issued by the Foreign Office Spokesperson said.
They reaffirmed their commitment to further strengthening the fraternal ties between the two brotherly nations.
The DPM welcomed the holding of 12th session of Pak-UAE Joint Ministerial Commission in the UAE next month after a hiatus of 13 years.
